item.title: C: Packing two integers in a single variable
item.description: Lately we needed to put a pair of small integers into a single int variable. (Let us gloss over the intricacies of what an int actually is and just assume it is 32-bit, shall we?) Nothing crazy hard but still, it took some trial and error before we got it right. So, if anybody needs it or is just curious, here’s the code: The code will test all possible tuples and quit if some unpacking gives an unexpected result. Continua su lou1306.github.io
